meanings.sent1: Before starting the game, the coach is predefining the rules for the players.
meanings.sent2: She is predefining the schedule for the upcoming week to stay organized.
meanings.sent3: The teacher predefining the homework on Friday made the students cheer.
meanings.sent4: By predefining the goals, the team set themselves up for success.
meanings.sent5: Predefining the path to follow made the journey much smoother.

meanings.sent1: The architect is predefining the layout of the new building before construction begins.
meanings.sent2: Before the meeting, the manager is predefining the topics to be discussed.
meanings.sent3: Predefining the movie plot before watching it made the experience more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: By predefining the ingredients, the chef ensured a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: She is predefining the steps to solve the math problem for better understanding.
